Package alydiaade.flooringmastery.view

Interface UserIO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserIOConsoleImpl
    public interface UserIO
    This is the user interface, outlining the methods of which the app will obtain information from the user.
    Author:
    lydiaadejumo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void print​(String message)
      This method will print out a particular message
      BigDecimal readBigDecimal​(String message, BigDecimal min)
      This method will print out a particular message and read a big decimal inputted by the user however it repeats until the correct data has been inputted.
      boolean readboolean​(String message)
      This method will print out a particular message and read a users input which will change to a boolean.
      LocalDate readDate​(String message)
      This method will print out a particular message and read a local date inputted by the user however it repeats until the correct data has been inputted, which must be a date in the future.
      LocalDate readFutureDate​(String message)
      This method will print out a particular message and read a local date inputted by the user however it can only be a date in the future for new orders.
      int readInt​(String message)
      This method will print out a particular message and read an integer inputted by the user however it repeats until the correct data has been inputted.
      int readInt​(String message, int min, int max)
      This method will print out a particular message and read an integer inputted by the user however it repeats until the correct data has been inputted, in this case the integer must be in the range of min and max
      String readString​(String message)
      This method will print out a particular message and read the user input string.

    • Method Detail

      • print

        void print​(String message)
        This method will print out a particular message
        Parameters:
        message - - the message that needs to be printed

      • readString

        String readString​(String message)
        This method will print out a particular message and read the user input string.
        Parameters:
        message - - the message that needs to be printed
        Returns:
        - the string that has been inputted.

      • readboolean

        boolean readboolean​(String message)
        This method will print out a particular message and read a users input which will change to a boolean.
        Parameters:
        message - - the message that needs to be printed
        Returns:
        - returns the boolean to the system for later use.

      • readBigDecimal

        BigDecimal readBigDecimal​(String message,
                          BigDecimal min)
        This method will print out a particular message and read a big decimal inputted by the user however it repeats until the correct data has been inputted.
        Parameters:
        message - - the message that needs to be printed
        min - - minimum value for input
        Returns:
        - The big decimal the user has inputted

      • readInt

        int readInt​(String message)
        This method will print out a particular message and read an integer inputted by the user however it repeats until the correct data has been inputted.
        Parameters:
        message - - the message that needs to be printed
        Returns:
        - The integer the user has inputted

      • readInt

        int readInt​(String message,
            int min,
            int max)
        This method will print out a particular message and read an integer inputted by the user however it repeats until the correct data has been inputted, in this case the integer must be in the range of min and max
        Parameters:
        message - - the message that needs to be printed
        min - - the minimum integer accepted
        max - - the maximum integer accepted
        Returns:
        - The integer the user has inputted

      • readDate

        LocalDate readDate​(String message)
        This method will print out a particular message and read a local date inputted by the user however it repeats until the correct data has been inputted, which must be a date in the future.
        Parameters:
        message - - the message that needs to be printed
        Returns:
        - The localDate the user has inputted

      • readFutureDate

        LocalDate readFutureDate​(String message)
        This method will print out a particular message and read a local date inputted by the user however it can only be a date in the future for new orders.
        Parameters:
        message - - the message that needs to be printed
        Returns:
        - The localDate the user has inputted
